QuestData.Title: Foxes and Hounds
QuestData.Description: These Alliance forces walk around the Plaguelands like they own the place. Well, they don't! This land rightfully belongs to the Dark Lady!$b$bAs the battle for Andorhal drew to a close, the Alliance forces occupying the Plaguelands scattered. Several of them can be found just east of here, hunting foxes. Prove to them that this is Forsaken territory.$b$bKill the hunters. Kill their hunting dogs. And kill the foxes they hunt, for good measure.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 4 Alliance Fox Hunters, 4 Bullmastiffs, and 4 Whitetail Foxes in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Dark Lady will not tolerate the living.
QuestData.RewardText: It's a relief to have those hunters out of the way. We're not done killing Alliance, however...
